subject: Re: Min-box vs. RS hack
author: Lance Oliver
full_text:
Thanks Rosemary!

;-)

BTW, have you had time to do any other communication sessions with 
your new MiniBox? 

Elaborating on the voice quality improvements with the MiniBox, and 
other positive results of your own, should be a big help to others 
deciding whether or not to grab one for their own experimentation. 

Since I personally know Ron, his thoughts, workmanship, ect... I've 
been sold on any concept of ITC equipment he might create since 
carrying own discussions for years running. Rick Moran deserves a big 
thanks for somehow coaxing him into finally building something that 
works! 

LOL!

Lance
